GSD.description:
net: tipc: fix possible refcount leak in tipc_sk_create()

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.18.13 by commit 3b2957fc09fe1ac7f07f40dd50dd5f93e3f3a7a2. For more details please see the references link.
